an6.67:1.1: “‘So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu papamitto papasahayo papasampavanko, papamitte sevamano bhajamano payirupasamano, tesanca ditthanugatim apajjamano abhisamacarikam dhammam paripuressati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an6.67:1.2: ‘Abhisamacarikam dhammam aparipuretva sekham dhammam paripuressati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an6.67:1.3: ‘Sekham dhammam aparipuretva silani paripuressati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an6.67:1.4: ‘Silani aparipuretva kamaragam va ruparagam va aruparagam va pajahissati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an6.67:2.1: ‘So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanamitto kalyanasahayo kalyanasampavanko, kalyanamitte sevamano bhajamano payirupasamano, tesanca ditthanugatim apajjamano abhisamacarikam dhammam paripuressati’ti thanametam vijjati.
an6.67:2.2: ‘Abhisamacarikam dhammam paripuretva sekham dhammam paripuressati’ti thanametam vijjati.
an6.67:2.3: ‘Sekham dhammam paripuretva silani paripuressati’ti thanametam vijjati.
an6.67:2.4: ‘Silani paripuretva kamaragam va ruparagam va aruparagam va pajahissati’ti thanametam vijjati”ti.
